alert.note: Alert for Scott (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 29 at 10:23AM CDT until August 29 at 10:45AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ROCK ISLAND...SCOTT AND EASTERN MUSCATINE COUNTIES... At 1023 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Blue Grass, or 9 miles southeast of Durant, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Andalusia around 1030 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Buffalo, West Lake Park, Mississippi Valley Fairgrounds, Credit Island, Milan, Blackhawk State Park, Davenport Municipal Airport, Coyne Center, Davenport, Moline, Rock Island, East Moline, Riverdale, Oak Grove, Panorama Park, Rock Island Arsenal, Fruitland and Moline Quad-City Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
